body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
We don't have visibility into how often we send query to closed workflows. And how long after the wf closed is the query requested.
This info could help to decide if we want to send sticky query to closed workflow or not.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

**Additional context**
The longer the delay of the query after wf closed the higher chance the cache would be evicted on SDK side.
title: Add metrics to measure how often queries are sent to closed workflows
